p: The use of the residual fraction of expressed lemon oil at the proposed use level in feed (12–35 mg/kg) would result in an average intake of total furocoumarins and methoxycoumarins ranging from 0.4 μg/kg bw per day in ornamental fish and 8.7 μg/kg bw per day in piglets (maximum intake 12.9 μg/kg bw per day).
